tool_description: Amazon Data Scrapper is the easiest way to get access to Products, Prices, Sales , Reviews etc data from Amazon in JSON format.
name: Amazon Data Scrapper KK
title: Amazon Data Scrapper KK

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-data-scrapper-kk.p.rapidapi.com/product/B081FZV45H"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-data-scrapper-kk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-data-scrapper-kk.p.rapidapi.com/product/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-data-scrapper-kk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
